title: Making a poll people can vote on too see if they like the new blue essence rework!
body: The new Blue essence patch is really bad for getting champions, Is there any way you guys could make a poll for the community to vote on so you can see what the majority of people prefer on the new essence. Its really hard to buy champions now with the new rework and people rarely get chests, it'll get really boring quickly with only so little champions

replies.body: I'm glad to see someone trying to bring everyone together to see how the community feels overall about these changes, but it may go pretty unnoticed here in H&S. I'd consider posting this over in Client Discussion and Gameplay as well to get more visibility and so the Devs have a better chance of seeing this!!

I voted old since even after 3 levels I only received 2400 BE(would be 2500 but i used a shard for leveling mastery on soraka) and I have yet to get a shard for a champ I don't own(granted I have all but 24-26 I can't remember), and as riot was kind enough to do and showed the math I have learned that I am indirectly being punished for binge playing since playing 8 or more has proven to show reduced BE gain compared to the old system.(I believe this is being fixed due to the exp ceiling is being lowered so this extreme should be fixed)

I also miss the 1700 IP random shard since that was my primary choice of getting champs from 80-something to now(yes I have most of the ones I wanted and since I am only missing 4800 and up I am basically paying 5100 to either get a 4800 or a 6300 champ) and with needing roughly 5 levels to get a 4800 champ and roughly 7 for 6300 champs. The shard deals I would have to give up on the potential gains of the 960 for the 4800 and 1260 for 6300
i would prefer a rollback do the old system
